title: Youth Arrested with Imitation Pistol in New Plymouth (New Zealand Police)
text: ( Source : New Zealand Police ) At 3.37pm on Saturday 10th October 2015 Police were advised of a male waving a gun around on the steps of New Plymouth Library , in Brougham Street , New Plymouth. Police attended and as a result 16 year old male
